revised_title: Royal Society's Finances: A Historical Overview from 1660 to 1768
tldr: This article provides a comprehensive analysis of the Royal Society's finances from 1660 to 1768, using newly discovered account books and papers. It presents a general survey of the Society's income and expenditure, as well as remarks on specific financial topics. The findings reveal the challenges faced by the Society in managing its finances during this period and the efforts made to secure funding for its various projects and initiatives.
